mapper.insert: insert into order_detail(order_no, uid, point_down, point_up, addr_name, postcode, addr, dt_addr, ex_addr, receiver, phone, request) values(#{orderNo}, #{uid}, ${pointDown}, ${pointUp}, #{addrName}, ${postcode}, #{addr}, #{dtAddr}, #{exAddr}, #{receiver}, #{phone}, #{request})
insert into order_product(order_no, prod_name, price, amount) select order_no, #{prodName}, ${price}, ${amount} from order_detail
mapper.delete: delete from cart where uid = #{uid} and status = 1
mapper.update: update product set stock = (stock - ${amount}) where prod_no = #{prodNo}
update user set point = (point + ${pointUp} - ${pointDown}) where uid = #{uid}
